attributes.action: reform cross media ownership laws so that Rupert Murdoch cannot continue to control four of the UK's national newspapers and the UK's largest television broadcaster (BSkyB).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government competition and media regulators will never properly take on Murdoch's monopoly practices in the UK while he controls the The Times, The Sunday Times, the News of  the World and The Sun.  The Government has too much to lose and the regulators are not as independent as they say they are.  The Murdoch monopolies are costing consumers millions and his control of the press undermines a key democratic institution.
